data.name: Sample - BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access - 1.0.0
data.description: BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access controls, manages, and audits privileged accounts and credentials. This enables just-in-time, zero trust access to on-premises and cloud resources by internal, external, and third-party users.

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of accounts from vault in BeyondTrust based on the filter criteria like name, type, account group, and any other details you have specified.
